EXPERIENCE THE UPLAND DIFFERENCE
Upland Homes Inc. is a Michigan based home builder that has been creating extraordinary homes for more than two decades. Our skill and integrity has earned us a reputation as one of the area's pre-eminent builders. We specialize in great locations, turn-key construction and . . . satisfied homeowners!

Custom Homes and Residential Communities
If you can dream it, we can build it. Many of our communities have received national recognition. We maintain control throughout the design and construction process to ensure that your residence is built to the highest quality standards - with cutting edge technology. Our custom homes are always exceptionally beautiful, well appointed and extremely comfortable. We have been creating happy homeowners for over 20 years.

Your Satisfaction
We manage all stages of each job. From the pre-design phase of a project through construction and delivery. We have formed long standing alliances with architects and experienced trades people and are proud members of both Michigan and National Builder's Associations.
